movies.title: Solomon
movies.plot: King David was renowned for his wisdom. On his deathbed, he anoints his younger son, Solomon, to be King of Israel. Solomon's older brother tries to wrest away the crown. But Solomon displays God-given wisdom and courage when he confronts his brother, saying, "If I must be king I will not live in fear. Kill me now if that is your plan, or else go home and never challenge God's will again." Faced with Solomon's courage, his brother says he will obey God's will. Solomon prays to God for the wisdom of King David, confiding, "I feel no wiser than a little child." The Lord appears to Solomon and tells him, "Solomon, because thou asked for wisdom to do good, and not for personal gain, I will give you a wise and understanding heart. Behold, there shall be none wiser than you." Solomon's wisdom is soon put to the test when two women appear at his court. Both claim to be the mother of a small infant. Solomon calls for a sword and orders that the child be cut in two. "Give each mother one half,...

biography.bio: Jamie Newcomb is an actor, known for Lone Wolf (1988), I Want to Keep My Baby! (1976) and Animated Stories from the Bible (1987).
biography.name: Jamie Newcomb

biography.bio: Ray Porter is an actor and casting director, known for Almost Famous (2000), Argo (2012) and The Runaways (2010).
biography.name: Ray Porter

biography.bio: Sandy McCallum was an actor, known for Death Race 2000 (1975), Animated Stories from the Bible (1987) and Animated Hero Classics (1991). He died on October 24, 2008 in Ashland, Oregon, USA.
biography.name: Sandy McCallum

biography.bio: Phil Hubbard is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987), The Animated Book of Mormon (1987) and Animated Hero Classics (1991).
biography.name: Phil Hubbard

biography.bio: Barry Kraft is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987), Animated Hero Classics (1991) and Breakthrough: A Portrait of Aristides Demetrios (1986).
biography.name: Barry Kraft

biography.bio: Aldo Billingslea is an actor, known for American Soil (2009), Fugitive Among Us (1992) and Animated Stories from the Bible (1987).
biography.name: Aldo Billingslea

biography.bio: Robert Lisell-Frank is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987) and Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987).
biography.name: Robert Lisell-Frank

biography.bio: Kevin Farrell is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987), Animated Hero Classics (1991) and Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987).
biography.name: Kevin Farrell

biography.bio: Jillian Crane was born on November 23, 1966 in Minneapolis, Minnesota, USA. She is an actress and producer, known for Election (1999), Great Kills Road (2009) and The Great New Wonderful (2005).
biography.name: Jillian Crane

biography.bio: Cindy Basco is an actress, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987), The Practice (1997) and Judging Amy (1999).
biography.name: Cindy Basco

biography.bio: James Arrington was born on December 17, 1948 as James Wesley Arrington. He is an actor, known for The Swan Princess (1994), The Swan Princess: Escape from Castle Mountain (1997) and The Swan Princess Christmas (2012).
biography.name: James Arrington

biography.bio: Eddie Wallace is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987).
biography.name: Eddie Wallace

biography.bio: Joe Hilsee is an actor, known for Tender Loving Care (1997), Tender Loving Care (1998) and Animated Hero Classics (1991).
biography.name: Joe Hilsee

biography.bio: Matthew Best was born in June 1980 in Salt Lake City, Utah, USA. He is an actor, known for The Paper Brigade (1996), Beyond Suspicion (1993) and Animated Stories from the Bible (1987).
biography.name: Matthew Best

biography.bio: Jonathan Best was born in 1977 in Salt Lake City, Utah, USA. He is an actor, known for Silent Night, Deadly Night (1984), The Legend of Wolf Mountain (1992) and Just Like Dad (1995).
biography.name: Jonathan Best
